mapper.select: SELECT CD_CITY cdCity , B.CD_NAME cityNm , CD_DISEASE cdDisease , C.CD_NAME diseaseNm , COUNT(*) cnt FROM GLITTER_DB.TBL_RESULT A, GLITTER_DB.TBL_CODE B, GLITTER_DB.TBL_CODE C WHERE B.CD_TYPE='1' AND A.CD_CITY = B.CD AND A.YEAR = #{year} AND A.CD_DISEASE = C.CD AND C.CD_TYPE = '3' GROUP BY CD_CITY, CD_DISEASE ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC, CD_CITY, CD_DISEASE
